attributes.action: government to insist on the removal of Hampstead School head Jacques Szemalikowski following following comments by student Kinnan Zaloom on a blog
attributes.additional_details:
government to insist on the removal of Hampstead School head Jacques Szemalikowski following completely unacceptable and dictatorial behaviour following comments by student Kinnan Zaloom on a blog. Mr Szemalikowski was quoted in the Camden new journal saying "I must do something. In the last year he has become more and more enchanted by anti-establishment ways of thinking and has even said that there is an inherent risk that every government is corrupt. I phoned Glasgow to warn them what sort of person they were dealing with, to advise them that this person thinks thoughts like these, and they could then make an informed decision. I am duty bound to do that.”

Mr Szemalikowski should be removed from education his actions are completely unacceptable
